title: Create Smart Janghai informational homepage with branded hero image

requirements.text: Build the public homepage for the informational website named “Smart Janghai”, including a hero section that prominently displays the brand name “SMART JANGHAI” and a short informational tagline, plus a simple layout for additional informational sections (e.g., intro, highlights, footer).

quotes: I WANT TO CREAT A WEBSITE THAT NAME IS SMART JANGHAI ... THIS WEBSITE IS COMPLETLY INFORMATIONAL WEBSITE

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage renders without errors and shows the brand name text exactly as “SMART JANGHAI”.
Hero section includes a short English tagline beneath the brand name.
Page includes at least two additional informational sections below the hero (content can be placeholder English text).
All user-facing text is in English.

requirements.text: Add and display a generated homepage hero image as a static frontend asset, stored under frontend/public/assets/generated, and use it as the hero background/primary visual on the homepage.

quotes: CAN YOU SUGGEST BEST STYLE HOMEPAGE IMAGE WITH BRAND NAME SMART JANGHAI

acceptanceCriteria: The generated image file is present under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact required filename.
Homepage hero visually uses the generated image (as an or CSS background) and remains readable (brand name and tagline have sufficient contrast).
No backend calls are used to serve or fetch the image.

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive, modern visual theme for the Smart Janghai informational site (colors, typography, spacing, and components) and enforce it consistently across the homepage. Do not use a blue-and-purple dominant palette.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across hero, sections, and footer (typography scale, spacing, and component styling feel unified).
Primary palette is not dominated by blue & purple together (choose an alternative modern palette).
Layout is responsive for mobile and desktop (no overlapping text in hero).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no multi-service architecture).
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose those components instead.
Store generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated; do not route images through the backend.
nonGoals: No user accounts or authentication flows (including Internet Identity) unless explicitly requested later.
No admin/CMS editing interface for informational content.
No third-party API integrations, analytics, or email capture forms.

required: Modern minimal tech-city hero banner with soft neutral gradient, subtle skyline silhouette, and large centered text “SMART JANGHAI” in clean sans-serif (hero-smart-janghai.dim_1920x1080.png)
